You are experiencing the following symptoms:

- Shortness of breath
- Dizziness
- Weakness
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
They started gradually over the past two weeks, but recently, I’ve been feeling much more exhausted than usual, even after resting. I notice I get short of breath just climbing stairs or walking short distances, and I sometimes feel dizzy when I stand up quickly. I’ve also felt weaker overall, like I can’t do the things I used to without getting tired very easily. I think it’s getting worse, especially since I’ve been pregnant with twins and haven’t been able to eat much iron-rich food lately.

I also feel dizzy when I stand up quickly, and I just don’t have as much strength as I used to. It’s been like this for a couple of weeks, and I think it’s even getting worse, especially since I haven’t been able to eat much iron-rich food with the pregnancy.
